short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens the Pong game in a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a straightforward ping-pong game with two paddles. Players hit the ball back and forth across the screen, trying to keep it in play. It's just a continuous rally for pure fun and practice!
